name: Sirami
description:
The game is currently discontinued. I need to search and find a proper art and gameplay design and waiting for the 3.0 version of the engine I use (Godot Engine). I'll rework on it later, but you will still be able to download it.

Sirami, the first game project of the NeoShadow Studio, is a rhythm game mostly inspired by osu!, a well known music game and Volumax, an innovative rhythm game which seems dead actually.

This project is currently under active development. The only information we can give to you is that it is made with Godot Engine. It will be available for Linux and Windows (Mac OS X and smart phones are not considered currently).

The game will be entirely free-to-play and open-source

Stay in turn with the official blog of NeoShadow Studio : https://neoshadow-studio.blogspot.fr/

Git repository !

Goodbye and see you soon !
